remarks: An equivalent way of saying "is a first-countable topology." (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
is1stc.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
is1stc2 $p |- ( J e. 1stc <-> ( J e. Top /\ A. x e. X E. y e. ~P J ( y ~<_ _om /\ A. z e. J ( x e. z -> E. w e. y ( x e. w /\ w C_ z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d J x y z $.
$d X x $.
$d w x y z $.
